name: Step2 Rain Showers Splash Pond Water Table, Kids Water and Sand Activity Sensory Playset, Summer Outdoor Toys, 13 Piece Water Toy Accessories, For Toddlers 1.5+ Years Old, Blue & Green
short_description: This kids’ water table will create a mini water park right in your backyard! Use the large bucket to scoop up water from the pond and pour into the top waterfall tray. Watch as the rainfall effect is activated as the water splashes into the pond!

As the waterfall drains back into the water table pond, maze-like spinners, ramps and buckets are activated! Rearrange the put-and-place maze pieces to create new waterfalls for fun cause and effect STEM play
Kids can make a spinning splash in the “rain” with the hand-held spinning wheel and use the side flipper to flip figures back into the pond!
Easy to clean! Use disinfectant wipes or household cleaners whenever you want!
product_description: Create A Mini Water Park Right In Your Back Yard With The Rain Showers Splash Pond Water Table By Step2. The Two-Tier Design Creates A Showering Splash Below! From The Side Flipper To The Put-And-Place Maze Pieces, Kids Will Have Lots Of Splish-Splash Fun With The Included Water Table Accessories!

product_description: Product Description The Step2 2-in-1 Sand and Water Table can bring your child's imagination to life. This outdoor playset provides limitless chances for creativity, sensory exploration, and fun playtime. This adaptable table gives a platform for infinite imagination, whether they're constructing sandcastles, splashing in water, or experimenting with new materials. The table's innovative 2-in-1 design divides it into distinct pieces, allowing many youngsters to play together. They can work together, discuss ideas, and build their own tiny water park in your garden. The interactive accessories, which include a 6-piece water accessory set and a molded-in road lid, improve the play experience, and stimulate imaginative storytelling. Built of high-quality materials, providing durability and long-lasting play. With the removable drain cap, cleaning up after playtime is a pleasure, making it simple for parents to keep the table clean. When not in use, the elastic tie-downs on the lid's ends keep everything securely covered, safeguarding the table and its contents from the elements. This outdoor playset is both entertaining and informative. It stimulates your child's interest in STEM subjects and encourages them to engage in hands-on, creative activities. Your kid develops vital abilities for future learning and growth by engaging in sensory exploration, problem-solving, and imaginative play. Make this summer unforgettable. It has a 42-inch connected umbrella that provides shade and shelter from the sun, allowing your children to play comfortably and safely. This playground promises hours of outdoor and indoor fun and wonderful memories for your child, whether it's in your backyard, at the beach, or in the house. Brand Story By Step 2

name: 4-in-1 Kitchen Play Sink Toys with Running Water for Kid,Color Changing Electric Water Table Toy with Animals, Food, Tableware Accessories,Pretend Role Birthday Toy for Boy and Girl
short_description: Color-Changing Play Sink Sets:The color-changing accessories will turn whiter when the water temperature is between 33°C and 42°C. When the temperature drops below 33°C, the color of the five color-changing accessories will return to their original blue. When the accessories change back to blue, it means that the water temperature has dropped. Parents should replace the water with warm water in time to prevent their children from catching a cold.

4 in 1 Water Sink Toys：This 4-in-1 water toy for kids combines kitchen toys, water play toys,fishing game and water table. Fruit, vegetables, cups, fork, plate, sponge, cloth, and brush provide an enjoyable dishwashing experience. Duck, frog, whale, octopus, water wheel, and slide offer a fun water play experience. Fishing rod, hooks, and fish immerse children in a fishing game.The legs of the water table are detachable, which can provide children with two different water play modes and enhance children's gaming experience.

Cute Cloud Shaped Faucet Design:Play sink with running water has a cute cloud-shaped faucet design. The electric faucet has a water circulation function. You only need to add warm water and turn on the switch to play, without having to add water repeatedly. The automatic pumping function of the dishwasher toy sink can simulate running water, giving children a more realistic game experience, strengthening their hands-on ability, and stimulating their imagination and creativity.

Child-Friendly Water Play for Kids：The sink toy is made of high-quality non-toxic ABS plastic, which is odorless and non-toxic, and has passed the US and EU certifications,ensuring safety and durability. Kitchen play sink set has smooth edges and no burrs to prevent scratches when children play, providing a safe and comfortable play space for children.

Educational Water Toy: This kitchen sink playset has rich accessories, which is suitable for children to play with friend and cultivate children's hands-on ability and social skills. The sink toy is very suitable for boy and girl over three years old and is a great gift for kids.

product_description: Step2's Summer Splash Water Table is the perfect interactive playtime experience that is designed to keep children engaged and thrilled while having fun outside! This water table, with its safe and appealing atmosphere, gives unlimited chances for splashing, pouring, and exploring. Our Summer Splash Water Table is designed to promote social interaction. Its huge surface area serves as an enticing gathering place for children to meet, interact, and acquire important social skills. Through imaginative water play experiences, your children will discover teamwork, close connections, and the joy of sharing. The Summer Splash Water Table comes with a selection of interactive accessories that will enhance your child's play experience and stimulate their imagination. A water table base, a rainforest canopy tray, and 13-piece accessories set with adorable tree-frog, toucan, and tropical fish squish toys are included in the kit. Allow your child's imagination to expand as they engage themselves in a bright world of imaginative play. We recognize the value of simplicity, which is why our Summer Splash Water Table is simple to clean. Draining the water is simple thanks to the handy plug. Simply grab a disinfectant wipe or a household cleanser and wipe away any mess as needed. This provides your children with a clean and sanitary play area, keeping them safe and healthy. Our Summer Splash Water Table is proudly crafted in the United States and is built to last. It is made of long-lasting double-walled plastic and is built to last for years. The brilliant colors of the water table will not chip, fade, crack, or peel, ensuring your children's enjoyment for a long time. With the Summer Splash Water Table, you'll be set for a summer of nonstop outdoor enjoyment. It's the ideal toddler companion, giving a platform for discovery, social engagement, and imaginative play. Order yours today to make wonderful memories of splashing fun!

name: 21" H Play Sink with Running Water, 4-in-1 Kids Kitchen Sink Toy with Electric Faucet, Mini Water Table with Detachable Legs, Fishing Game, Pretend Play Dishwasher Gift Set for Boys & Girls(Blue)
short_description: Upgrade playtime with our 4-in-1 multi-functional sink toy! Now with detachable legs, it's perfect for both standing and tabletop fun. This versatile set combines kitchen play, water park excitement, fishing fun, and a working sink all in one. With an expanded 3L water capacity and raised height, it’s designed for a comfortable, immersive experience for kids of all ages

Welcome to the Mini Water World! Watch the animals have a blast at the water park! The duck rides waves, the whale sends water down steps, and the frog enjoys a cozy bath, and the coconut tree waterfall adds a beautiful touch to the scenery. Don’t miss the thrilling fishing game, where kids can test their hand-eye coordination and compete to see who can catch the most fish. Nonstop water park fun awaits!

Realistic Water Flow Design: Experience the enchantment of our innovative water circulation system, delivering a continuous stream of water just like a real faucet. The cloud-shaped faucet rotates a full 90°, allowing kids to wash from any angle without wasting water. This durable, sealed design ensures hours of mess-free fun while teaching kids about water conservation and household tasks. (Requires 4 AA batteries.)

Little Helpers in Action: Let your kids mimic real kitchen tasks by washing vegetables, scrubbing plates, and rinsing utensils just like adults. The playset, complete with drying areas, allows little ones to practice organizing and tidying up their "dishes" after washing. Engaging in meaningful pretend role play helps children enhance their understanding of household responsibilities and boost their organizational skills.

Safe and Perfect for Gifting: Crafted from high-quality, materials, this 4-IN-1 sink toy with detachable legs ensures safe and sustainable play. Its robust design promises years of enjoyment, making it a wonderful gift for birthdays, holidays, or any special occasionit, brings joy to pretend play lovers and helps children learn vital life skills. This sink toy is a wonderful addition to any child's collection.
